title: Wild Rice Chicken Soup
ingredients: ['115g butter', '1 onion, finely chopped', '65g celery, chopped', '65g carrots, sliced', '225g fresh mushrooms, sliced', '100g plain flour', '1.5 litres chicken stock', '375g cooked wild rice', '450g boneless skinless chicken breasts, cooked and cubed', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon curry powder', '1/2 teaspoon mustard powder', '1/2 teaspoon dried parsley', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '115g flaked almonds', '3 tablespoons dry sherry', '500ml single cream']
